name: evomp
description: A GT-MP Multiplayer framework. Frontend only.
author: Sascha <sascha8a@gmail.com>

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node Build/web.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config Build/webpack.config.js --mode production --run-prod --reporter basic && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node Build/createMeta
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_E  NV=development node Build/web.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config Build/webpack.config.js --log-level error --mode development --run-dev --reporter basic --cache && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node Build/createMeta
